Man, I love me some good NTR but this bitch is just mean. Not that cheating is ever okay outside fantasy but she has zero feelings for the guy she married and it's not even for money since she also works, just two sick people manipulating someone's life for their highs, pure evil. LOL

Or is NTR a metaphor about this kind of evil, greedy people using other people's trust to get what they want and how it corrupts the idea of "faithful wife", a stand in for the laws and institutions made to make us secure. So people are not really into it for the cheating, but how it represents the corruption that we know exists, we can't see or experience unless we are willing to the corrupted by it and the highs those people that take part on it feels: criminals, politicians and corporate.

And so we have those that enjoy it as fantasy, those that reject it outright because of the fear of corruption itself and some that see it a think "I've seen worse".
